description: Java Spring Boot REST controller defining basic endpoints for health checks, documentation redirect, and info messages. Handles incoming HTTP GET requests and provides responses or redirects accordingly.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic health, documentation, and info endpoints for the backend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to root '/' and returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects users to the Swagger UI documentation, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns a simple status string indicating the application's health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns information about the application.
